word_mean: 输精管切除术：用手术切除输精管的全部或部分，可作为前列腺切除术的一个部分，或为绝育而施行

entry.def: A vasectomy is a surgical operation in which the tube that carries sperm to a man's penis is cut, usually as a means of contraception.

means.word_mean: 1. surgical procedure that removes all or part of the vas deferens (usually as a means of sterilization); is sometimes reversible
